title: Deirouné
description: An ancient place, located in modern Syria, with remains of a monastic chapel. Inscribed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 2011 as part of the "Ancient Villages of Northern Syria."

properties.description: Location of the Byzantine ruins in Deirouné. Coordinates determined by eye in Google Earth in November 2012, following description in UNESCO World Heritage List.
properties.title: Byzantine Ruins in Deirouné
